content: I understand in 1.8.1 that new members joining private stream won't see prior messages. If I make the stream public and then switch it immediately back to private, will all stream members be able to see all messages?
(Well, they would while it was public, but that's not what you're asking)

@Scott Russell there is a privacy setting that may be what you want, though: https://zulipchat.com/help/stream-permissions (Private, shared history)
It's not in 1.8.1, but will be in 1.9 and is in master now.
Yes, Iâ€™m definitely looking for that. :blush: Looking forward to 1.9!
